Changes the name of your bot.

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
bool ircChangeNick(string newNick)
</syntaxhighlight>

===Required arguments===
* '''newNick:''' How you want your bot to be called.

===Returns===
Returns true if the nick was changed successfully, false otherwise.
